description: Unit tests for the FirecrawlTools class, including mock setup and various method tests.

methods.name: mock_firecrawl
methods.description: Creates a mock FirecrawlApp instance for testing.

methods.name: firecrawl_tools
methods.description: Creates a FirecrawlTools instance with mocked dependencies.

methods.name: test_init_with_env_vars
methods.description: Tests initialization of FirecrawlTools with environment variables.

methods.name: test_init_with_params
methods.description: Tests initialization of FirecrawlTools with explicit parameters.

methods.name: test_scrape_website
methods.description: Tests the scrape_website method of FirecrawlTools.

methods.name: test_crawl_website_with_custom_limit
methods.description: Tests crawl_website with a custom limit parameter.

methods.name: test_search
methods.description: Tests the search method with a successful response.

methods.name: test_search_with_error
methods.description: Tests the search method when an error occurs.

methods.name: test_search_with_custom_params
methods.description: Tests the search method with additional search parameters.
